greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A097249(A260443(n)).
comment: a(n) = number of times we must iterate A097246, starting at A260443(n), before the result is squarefree.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
program: (define (A097249_for_coeff_list nums) (let loop ((nums nums) (s 0)) (if (<= (reduce max 0 nums) 1) s (loop (A097246_for_coeff_list nums) (+ 1 s)))))
;; For the other required functions, see A260443.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 15 2016
